moves.1. d4:
Thanks Baumannjoe for the time-share.______I had annotated in live, playing the game.
No db, no engine and without moving pieces (to train the visualization).
I had written the candidates moves and the lines i had seen (or believe to see).______So all can be totally wrong :-)________Any comments are welcome.
Here is the end of the line of this thematic game.
moves.6... cxd4 7. exd4 Bd6 8. Ndf3: With this move i am at the end of my opening knowledge.
moves.8... O-O 9. Ne5: The usual outpost but with Nf3-e5 and Nd2 to keep an eye on Ne4.______Because of the move order of this thematic mt, things are differents.
moves.9... Ne7 10. Ngf3 Ng6 11. O-O Nh5 12. Ng:
The turn of the game.______12.Ne1 looks ok but restrict the attack and take the square for a Qe1-h4. i don't look more because Ng5 looks very interesting______12.Ng5 f6_13.Qxh5 fxg5_14.Nxg6 hxg6_15.Bxg6 Re8_
16.Qh7_and i suppose g7 will be taken by the white queen (but i can't visualize well in my mind)
______or______13...h6_14.Bxg6 and it looks like the line above______
If take with the knight :______12...f6_13.Nxg6 hxg6_14.Bxg6 But it can't visualize more______
12...Nf6 and it is hard to see a line after this move. An idea can be 13.Rf3-h3 and then throw the knight or the rook on h7 to remove Nf6. Qh5 will be then possible.
moves.12... f6 13. Qxh5 fxg5 14. Nxg6 Rf6:
15.Ne7+ Bxe7
16.Qxh7+ seems a dead-end______15.Ne5 Rh6 (or g6 or h6)_16.Qxg5 Qxg5_17.fxg5 Bxh2+ not cool_
.....i look again and Fxh2 is not possible because of Ne5. Difficult once again to visualize in the mind the lines.
moves.15. Ne5 Rh6 16. Qxg5 Be7: 17.Qg3 and no lift Rf3-h3______17..Qg4 the lift Rf3-h3 is possible
moves.17. Qg4 Bd7: 18.Nxd7 free e6, i don't like______18.f5 Rh4_19.Qf3 and... well i don't know but i don't think there will have a tragedy for white so let's go.
moves.18. f5 Rh4 19. Qf3 Be8: 20.fxe6 Bh5_21.Qf5 g6_22.Qf7+ (and a bishop or a knight on f7 perhaps, but one again it am not able to visualize 2 moves and a half)
moves.20. fxe6 Bf6 21. Bg5: According to " how analysis " it is important to have one move we like in the game. It is this one for me, mostly because it show that spending hours doingtactics exercices will give a cool feed-back....sometimes.
moves.21... Rh5 22. Bxf6:
22...gxf6_23.Nf7 Bxf7_24.exf7+ Kxf7_25.Qxh5+ and there is lines open so probably very dangerous.
______23...Qb7 (or Qe7)_24.Qxh5

gameName: Walking The Walk and Learning to Run Part 6
